page.title: 03DECHMONT VILLAGE WEST
page.content: The west part of Dechmont Village is in our block. Housing in this attractive village is owned either by {Bangour}Hospital,the Local Council or privately owned.The older houses are mostly terraced but the more modern housing(10-15 years old) is semi-detached or detached. The village has an{Infant School}built in 1913 with an extension added in 1962. The previous school for this area(Log Book starts in 1888)was at Craig Binning but a new school had to be found because of an infestation of rats. Although the Infant School only has around twenty pupils it has taught five different{nationalities}at one time. After their infant schooling at Dechmont the pupils move to Kirkhill Primary School in Broxburn which is three miles east of the village.
